alert.note: Alert for Koochiching (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 12 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Koochiching County through 830 PM CDT... At 728 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 19 miles northwest of Big Falls, or 38 miles southwest of International Falls, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow unsecured objects around. Minor hail damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Birchdale and Manitou. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Anyone outdoors, including anyone on or in the water, should seek shelter inside a sturdy building or hard topped vehicle.
